item.title: NFQUEUE and the Mysterious RESET
item.description: While working on my load balancer, Caplance, I ran into a very strange error when trying to establish a connection between a client and a backend. Before I go to deep, though, let me give a quick intro into how TCP connection establishment works. Types of Message When establishing a TCP connection, there are 4 possible packet types you could see: SYN (S in tcpdump) - Always the first message sent.
